articles.title: 10 finance firms effectively own half of all future carbon emissions

articles.title: Artificial finger can identify what common material things are made of
articles.description: Smart finger uses sensors to detect substances such as glass, silicon and wood with more than 90 per cent accuracy, which could be useful for robotic manufacturing tasks

articles.title: If cryptocurrencies are unhackable, how do they keep getting stolen?
articles.description: News of a $190 million cryptocurrency theft emerged this week, despite cryptocurrencies being designed to be unhackable. Here's the low-down on what's going on and how safe bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies are

articles.title: Early humans may have wiped out many turtles millions of years ago
articles.description: Our hominin ancestors wiped out many land-living turtle and tortoise species starting around 5 million years ago, an analysis of the fossil record suggests
